## Curve3.CreateCatmullRomSpline() method

Returns a Curve3 object along a CatmullRom Spline curve :

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static CreateCatmullRomSpline(points: Vector3[], nbPoints: number, closed?: boolean): Curve3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  points | <code>Vector3[]</code> | (array of Vector3) the points the spline must pass through. At least, four points required |
|  nbPoints | <code>number</code> | (integer) the wanted number of points between each curve control points |
|  closed | <code>boolean</code> | (boolean) optional with default false, when true forms a closed loop from the points |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Curve3`

the created Curve3
